items.title: [NYT > Business] Malfunction Forces Japan to Take Restarted Nuclear Plant Offline
items.content_html: The setback occurred hours after one of the world‚Äôs largest nuclear complexes restarted, ending more than a decade of dormancy following the 2011 Fukushima Daiichi meltdown.

items.title: [Metafilter] Old tyres could help build tougher roads for the NT's extreme climate
items.content_html: Old tyres could help build tougher roads for the Northern Territory's extreme climate. Roads buckle under the pressure of the Northern Territory's harsh climate, but a group of researchers think repurposing discarded materials may be the solution — not only helping the environment, but government budgets too. (Australia)
